text: tavada minisata yam haniyak sparsa vu vita ohu tama paramadhipati veta yomu vi ohuta kannalav karayi. pasu va ohuta ohugen vu yam anugrahayak pirinæmu vita ohu mita pera kavara deyak veta kannalav karamin sitiye da eya amataka kota allahge margayen nomaga yavanu pinisa ohuta samanayan tabayi. “oba obe deva pratiksepaya samaga svalpa kalayak bhukti vidinu. niyata vasayenma oba (nira)ginne sagayin aturini” yæyi (nabi muhammad,) oba pavasanu
